page.title: 07Telford United F.C.
page.content: Once called Wellington Town,Telford United have been made famous by their F.A.Cup runs of 1983/84 and'85,during which time they defeated 8 of their 10 Football League opponents.Included in the list of 'scalps' were Wigan, Northampton, Bradford City and Darlington. In the final of the 1971 F.A.Trophy they lost 2-0 to Macclesfield Town, but returned to Wembley a year later to defeat Hillington Borough 3-2. In 1979 they joined the Alliance Premier League, finishing 3rd in 1982 and hitting the headlines in the F.A.Cup. 1983 saw them win the F.A. Trophy again with a 2-1 win over Northwich Victoria.In 1985 they had another good run in the F.A.Cup, but lost 3-0 in their 5th round match against the 1st Division Champions Everton.
